title: Hindu Philosophies & Upanishads Bundle
subtitle: Complete Journey Through Ancient Indian Wisdom
description: Master the six classical schools of Hindu philosophy and explore the profound wisdom of the Upanishads in this comprehensive learning bundle.
features: Six classical schools of Hindu philosophy (Darshanas)
Deep exploration of Upanishadic wisdom and teachings
Interactive learning with renowned philosophy scholars
Comprehensive study materials and reading lists
Lifetime access to all materials and updates
Master certificate for completing the entire bundle

courses.name: Samkhya Darshan
courses.description: Explore the analytical philosophy of Samkhya

courses.name: Nyaya Darshan
courses.description: Master the logical reasoning system of Nyaya

courses.name: Vaisheshik Darshan
courses.description: Understand the atomic theory of Vaisheshik

courses.name: Yoga Darshan
courses.description: Learn the practical philosophy of Yoga

courses.name: Tantra Darshan
courses.description: Explore the esoteric philosophy of Tantra

courses.name: Kashmir Shaivism
courses.description: Discover the non-dual philosophy of Kashmir Shaivism
